message:
Doodle-4-Google.

‎"... what Google knows and many parents don't know is that a person's city of birth & year of birth can be used to make a statistical guess about the first 5 digits of his/her social security number. Then, if you can somehow obtain those last 4 SSN digits explicitly—voila, you've unlocked countless troves of personal information..."

http://nymag.com/daily/intel/2011/02/no_big_deal_but_googles_may_ha.html
